title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (Ardee, 
Drogheda, Dundalk and Louth) Order 2025. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 1st of September 2025
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day hour (ardee drogheda dundalk louth) order 2025 (b) order shall come operation 1st september 2025

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by— 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the deletion at reference number 164 of the matter in columns (2), 
(3), (4) and (5) and 

the deletion at reference number 166 of the matter in columns (2), 
(3), (4) and (5) and 

the substitution at reference number 167 for the matter in columns 
(3), (4) and (5) of the following: 

“District Court Area 
of Louth 

Ardee – Second 
Friday in each month. 

Drogheda – First, 
Second, Third and 
Fourth Monday, Third 
and Fourth Tuesday 
and First and Second 
Thursday in each 
month. 

Dundalk – First and 
Second Tuesday, First, 
Second, Third and 
Fourth Wednesday 
and Third and Fourth 
Thursday. 

All sittings at 10.30 
a.m. 

The area comprising 

(a) 

the borough of Drogheda, 

the Electoral Divisions of 

(b) 
Ardee Rural, Ardee Urban, 
Ballymascanlan, Barronstown, 
Carlingford, Castlebellingham, 
Castlering, Castletown, Clogher, 
Clonkeen, Collon, Creggan 
Upper, Darver, Dromin, 
Dromiskin, Drumcar, 
Drummullagh, Dundalk Rural, 
Dundalk No. 1 Urban, Dundalk 
No. 2 Urban, Dundalk No. 3 
Urban, Dundalk No. 4 Urban, 
Dunleer, Dysart, Faughart, 
Greenore, Haggardstown, 
Jenkinstown, Louth, 
Mansfieldstown, Monasterboice, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 [385] 3 

Mullary, Rathcor, Ravensdale, 
St. Peter's, Stabbanan, 
Tallanstown and Termonfeckin 
in the county of Louth, and (c) 
the Electoral Divisions of 
Ardcath, Drumcondra, Duleek, 
Julianstown, Killary, 
Posseckstown, Rathfeigh, St. 
Mary's and Stamullin in the 
county of Meath.”

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service, 

30 July, 2025. 

PAUL KELLY, 

Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to 
sign documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

LISA SCOTT, 

Officer of the Courts Service designated for purpose of 
authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to 
section 10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [385] 5

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the abolition of the District Court Areas of Ardee, 
Drogheda and Dundalk and the creation of a new District Court Area within 
District No. 6 to consist of the territorial area formerly constituting the District 
Court area of Ardee and the territorial area formerly constituting the District 
Court Area of Drogheda and the territorial area formerly constituting the District 
Court Area of Dundalk, the new District Court Area is to be known as the District 
Court area of Louth. 

 
 
 
 
 6 [385]
